name: Rainbow Kitty Jam
description:
Rainbow Kitty

Just your ordinary flying kitty shooting rainbows that have the power to bring color back to the world.

Controls: 

Arrow keys for movement

Press "a" to shoot rainbows - try and hit the gems!

Assets used -

https://elthen.itch.io/2d-pixel-art-cat-sprites

https://greatdocbrown.itch.io/coins-gems-etc

Made For Try Jam 126 (3 hour Rainbow Theme)

By the BetaBytes team

https://www.betabytes.io/

Using the mini Rust game engine heavily inspired by pico8

https://github.com/beta-bytes/bbmicro
